Headline: Temporary #60 Blue Island/26th Reroute at Cicero/24thPl
ShortDescription: 60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted near Cicero/24thPl.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Cicero, 24th Place, 49th Ave, Cermak, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near Cicero/24thPl.

Allow extra travel time.
